creator: scottdavenport
title: Creating A Warm Sunset
description: This project outlines the steps to create a warm and inviting feel to a sunset image using post-processing techniques. It demonstrates how different stylizing can deliver a very different feel to the viewer.
steps: Start with an original image straight from the camera, applying only a basic lens correction to eliminate bowing and warping of a wide-angle lens.
Set the white balance using a reference point in the image, such as the foam of the waves, aiming for pure white.
Adjust the exposure and tone of the photo to achieve a good range of blacks and whites while avoiding clipping in shadows and highlights.
Increase the contrast and/or clarity of the photo to visually sharpen the image, making details like fingers of water crisper.
Adjust color, saturation, and vibrance, adding a soft warming effect to amplify orange hints in the sky and rocks. Optionally, add a slight radial blur effect to the sky for a more dynamic look.
Apply localized sharpening to the subject in the foreground, keeping the sky soft. Finish with a vignette to draw the viewer's eye in.
